text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking poor with 5 ft @9s NW swell and fresh 18 mph WNW winds. Tomorrow, conditions improve slightly with 5 ft @9s WNW swell and 18 mph SW winds, but still not ideal. By the day after, the swell drops to 4 ft @10s W with similar winds, keeping it workable at best. Best: tomorrow.
